live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
32821.summary: Some customers in the Joyce-Collingwood area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
32821.title: Jan 31 - Vancouver (Joyce-Collingwood) | All Services - Outage
